comment: To the leaders of Iran - DO NOT KILL YOUR PROTESTERS . Thousands have already been killed or imprisoned by you , and the World is watching . More importantly , the USA is watching . Turn your internet back on and let reporters roam free ! Stop the killing of your great Iranian people !
amr:
# ::snt To the leaders of Iran - DO NOT KILL YOUR PROTESTERS . Thousands have already been killed or imprisoned by you , and the World is watching . More importantly , the USA is watching . Turn your internet back on and let reporters roam free ! Stop the killing of your great Iranian people !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (k / kill-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (p2 / protest-01)
                        :poss y))
            :ARG2 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                        :ARG1 (c / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Iran")))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (o / or
                  :op1 (k2 / kill-01
                        :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                        :ARG1 (p4 / person
                              :quant (m2 / multiple
                                    :op1 1000)))
                  :op2 (ii / imprison-01
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG1 p4)
                  :time (a2 / already))
            :op2 (w / watch-01
                  :ARG0 (w2 / world)))
      :snt3 (w3 / watch-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "USA"))
            :ARG1-of (ii2 / important-01
                  :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 w3
                        :ARG3 (m3 / more))))
      :snt4 (a3 / and
            :op1 (t / turn-on-13
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y3 / you)
                  :ARG1 (ii3 / internet
                        :poss y3))
            :op2 (l2 / let-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y3
                  :ARG1 (r / roam-01
                        :ARG0 (p5 / person
                              :ARG0-of (r2 / report-01))
                        :ARG1-of (f / free-04))))
      :snt5 (s2 / stop-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y4 / you)
            :ARG1 (k3 / kill-01
                  :ARG0 y4
                  :ARG1 (p6 / person
                        :mod (c3 / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Iran"))
                        :mod (g / great)))))

comment: I'm not sure what this guy's schtick is to have k followers , but I've seen two tweets from him in the last couple of days and they were both two of the dumbest things I've seen on Twitter .
amr:
